messages.title: Competent leadership
messages.content: Job total hits record high while wages surge. Tax cuts for workers and savers. More jobs. New businesses.

messages.title: Coalition of chaos
messages.content: Labour plan to borrow risks £170bn extra debt. We'll hold Labour to ransom - Vince Cable.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Keep mortgage rates low so families are more financially secure. Build more homes including 200,000 new Starter Homes for first-time buyers under 40. Extend the Help to Buy scheme to 2020 to help more people onto the housing ladder.
The deficit down. Income tax cut.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Labour plan to borrow risks £170bn extra debt. Vince Cable: Lib Dems would enter a coalition with Labour and SNP.

issues.economy: More debt. Higher taxes. Jobs lost.

housing.content: Keep mortgage rates low so families are more financially secure. Build more homes including 200,000 new Starter Homes for first-time buyers under 40. Extend the Help to Buy scheme to 2020 to help more people onto the housing ladder.

images.caption: Our commitments to build a Britain where everyone who works hard can have a home of their own.
Competent leadership for a better future.
